name: analyst
title: Analyst
description: Person who performed the analyses. Example: \"Jean Martin\"

name: biocontrol_ability
title: Biocontrol
description: Pathogen control capacity. Example: \"Fusarium oxysporum inhibition\"

name: dataset_doi
title: Dataset DOI
description: Persistent identifier for the dataset (Digital Object Identifier). Example: \"10.5281/zenodo.123456\"

name: extraction_protocol
title: Extraction protocol
description: DNA extraction method. Example: \"DNeasy PowerSoil Kit\"

name: filter_size
title: Filter size
description: Filter size for water samples (micrometers). Example: 0.22

name: library
title: Amplicon/library
description: Targeted gene region. Example: \"16S rRNA V4-V5\"

name: location_name
title: Location name
description: Sampling site description. Example: \"Experimental Field A, Versailles\"

name: merging_tool
title: Merging tool
description: Read merging tool for paired-end data. Example: \"FLASH v1.2.11\"

name: metadata_version
title: Metadata version
description: Version of the metadata schema used. Example: \"1.2\"

name: qc_protocol
title: QC protocol
description: Quality control procedure. Example: \"16S sequence verification by PCR\"

name: ref_database
title: Reference database
description: Taxonomic reference database name and version. Example: \"SILVA 138.1\"

name: sample_name
title: Sample name
description: Unique identifier for each sample. Example: \"Soil_2023_SiteA_Rep1\"

name: sampler
title: Sampler
description: Person who performed the sampling. Format: \"Firstname Lastname\". Example: \"Marie Dupon\"

name: treatment_details
title: Treatment details
description: Applied experimental conditions. Example: \"Irrigation at 50% field capacity\"
